text: nam malakkukaleat ninnal adamin pranamam ceyyuka enn paranna sandarbham (srad'dheyamatre.) avar pranamam ceytu. iblis olike. avan jinnukalil pettavanayirunnu. annane tanre raksitavinre kalpana avan dhikkariccu. ennirikke ninnal enne vitt avaneyum avanre santatikaleyum raksadhikarikalakkukayanea? avar ninnalute satrukkalatre. akramikalkk (allahuvinâ€Œ) pakaram kittiyat valare citta tanne
